name: Storm Brewing
description:
PITCH

Valiant pilots set off in a zeplin to confront a dragon in the middle of a storm to put an end to the reign of terror.

But be careful, just because you think you've beaten him doesn't mean it's over!

GAMEPLAYS

In the first phase of the game the dragon wants you to run away. Try to dodge the lightning bolts and his charges by all means!

Once you have exhausted its patience, it will face you. You must then succeed in killing it.

CONTROLS

W / A / S / D - to move

SPACE - to shoot

Escape - to pause

THE TEAM

Nicolas Valadou - Game Programmer - Part 1

Félix Jouanneau - Game Programmer - Part 2
